biotools.summary: GlycoPP is a webserver for predicting potential N-and O-glycosites in prokaryotic protein sequence(s), where N-glycosite is an Asn residue and O-glycosite could be a serine or threonine residue having a glycan attached covalently and enzymatically at amide or hydroxyl group respectively.

bioschemas.name: glycopp
bioschemas.summary: GlycoPP is a webserver for predicting potential N-and O-glycosites in prokaryotic protein sequence(s), where N-glycosite is an Asn residue and O-glycosite could be a serine or threonine residue having a glycan attached covalently and enzymatically at amide or hydroxyl group respectively.
